title: MD
biography: The euro is the official currency of 21 of the 27 member states of the European Union. This group of states is officially known as the euro area or, more commonly, the eurozone. The euro is divided into 100 euro cents.
aiSummary: Esper Kallás is a virology specialist with an H-index of 64 at University of São Paulo (Member). Has been published in New England Journal of Medicine, The Lancet Infectious Diseases, Science Translational Medicine. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
